dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent academic papers and edges denote citation relationships. Each node's features are represented as bag-of-words vectors, and the label corresponds to its research topic category.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to Cora, where nodes represent academic papers and edges denote citation relationships. Each node's features are represented as bag-of-words vectors, and the label corresponds to its research topic category.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent academic papers and edges denote citation relationships. Each node's features are represented as word2vec embeddings of paper abstracts, and the label corresponds to its subject area.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: Xiao Huang
Jundong Li
Xia Hu
dcterms:description: A social network dataset where nodes represent users and edges represent interactions between users. Node features are metadata attributes derived from users' photos.
dcterms:title: Flickr

dcterms:creator: Will Hamilton
Zhitao Ying
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: A social network dataset where nodes represent posts and edges represent comments linking the posts. Node features are various attributes of the posts.
dcterms:title: Reddit

dcterms:creator: Weihua Hu
Matthias Fey
Marinka Zitnik
Yuxiao Dong
Hongyu Ren
Bowen Liu
Michele Catasta
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset from the Open Graph Benchmark suite where nodes represent papers from the arXiv repository and edges represent citation relationships. Node features are word2vec embeddings of paper abstracts.
dcterms:title: ogbn-arxiv
